REUTERS.UNKNOWN: T f1149 reute d f BC-DANISH-SUGAR-BEET-PLA 04-24 0079

TEXT.TITLE: DANISH SUGAR BEET PLANTING BEHIND SCHEDULE
TEXT.BODY: Sugar beet planting in Denmark is about two weeks behind normal due to a severe winter and a wet spring, a spokesman for the country's largest sugar beet concern, De Danske Sukkerfabrikker A/S, said. The weather has improved recently but very little beet has been drilled so far. "If good weather conditions continue, I think we will be sowing next week or the following week," the spokesman said. Reuter
